Class Controller

  • Method Details

    • getAllConverters

      public static java.util.ArrayList<AbstractConverter> getAllConverters()
      Load and return a list of all AbstractConverter that is in a fixed path
      Returns:
      a list of all AbstractConverter found

    • getListConvertByMeasureType

      public static java.util.ArrayList<AbstractConverter> getListConvertByMeasureType​(MeasureType measureType)
      Load a list of all AbstractConverter that is in a fixed path Then filter the list of AbstractConverter based in the MeasureType of the elements
      Parameters:
      measureType - that will remain in the list
      Returns:
      list of all AbstractConverter that has the allowed MeasureType

    • convertMeasure

      public static java.lang.String convertMeasure​(AbstractConverter convertFrom, AbstractConverter convertTo, java.lang.String stringConvertFrom)
      Convert a value from a certain Measure to another Measure
      Parameters:
      convertFrom - the measure of the given value
      convertTo - the measure that the value will be converted to
      stringConvertFrom - the value that will be converted
      Returns:
      string in Scientific Notation of the value converted

    • createViewConverter

      public static void createViewConverter() throws java.lang.Exception
      Create a instance of the view ViewConverter, set the values and then show the view
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if occur an error during the load of the Converters Classes
